name: Invasion With Style
description:
Space Cats!

The cats who sit in their space station, experimenting on Catnipium, have just been hit by an asteroid, and now both meteors and Canipium are plumeting to earth!

Don't worry, using their mega space canon, the cats can race down to earth!

============================================

The goal is to reach the planet in the fastest time.

Hitting the blue Catnipium asteroids will speed you up

Hitting the grey rock asteroids will slow you down

Move around with WASD or the arrow keys.

Post your time in the comments, see who can reach the planet fastest!

===============================================

I am claiming that I performed all Design, Implementation, and Blueprint work myself during the Jam time.

I am also claiming that pretty much all artwork and sound were sourced from the following:

Luo’s Particle Toolkit volume 1 https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/slug/luos-s-a-particle-a-day-volume

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/slug/feline-swordsman
